ValidationRule.description: When User Select TT of Mode PickList and Forex of Mode Selection then not entering data in Cheque/DD Date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Mode__c , 'TT') , ISPICKVAL( Mode_Selection__c,'forex') , ISBLANK( Cheque_DD_Date__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: After Selecting TT of Mode PickList and Forex of Mode Selection Pick List,Cheque/DD Date cann't be blank.
